item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Akshay. I’m an engineer living in San Francisco, CA. Some background details: I grew up in San Jose, CA and Bangalore, India Went to Caltech Currently work on perception at Nuro focusing on using machine learning to track objects I am a machine learning engineer with experience across the stack. My current focus is on developing software that leverages ML models to provide value to users. I am particularly interested in areas such as self-driving cars, video editing, code generation, writing assistants, new interfaces for idea generation, and automating computers.
